content.prompt: Concern over which of the following best explains Steenâ€™s decision to portray The Dissolute Household as shown in image 2 ?

choices.label: The effects of conflicts between Catholics and Protestants in the Netherlands

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
